text.content: This weekend I went to get a haircut . I went down town to my favorite barber shop and waited for the barber to be done with his current client . I sat and read some magazines while I waited . Then when it was my turn . If I wanted , I could choose from a selection of hair cuts he had on his walls , or I could ask for something specific , but I just wanted my usual . I had n't come in for a hair cut in a while , so I had a lot of hair to remove . I sat in his barber chair , and he put a cloth around my neck to keep the hair off of my clothes . He sprayed my hair with a little water to keep the loose hair together , and then he began clipping away the larger amounts of hair with a pair of scissors . Then when my hair was shorter , he brought out some electric hair clippers and started trimming my hair to an even length . The clippers made a loud buzzing noise in my ear , which used to scare me but now I think is kind of fun . Finally , he used the scissors again to trim any stray hairs , and then wiped me off and took off the cloth . I paid him , shook his hand and thanked him , and left the barber shop with my nice clean hair cut .

label.name: Evoking
label.text: come in for a hair cut
